verses.roman:
ajamīḍhād bṛhadiṣus
tasya putro bṛhaddhanuḥ
bṛhatkāyas tatas tasya
putra āsīj jayadrathaḥ

synonyms: ajamīḍhāt—from Ajamīḍha; bṛhadiṣuḥ—a son named Bṛhadiṣu; tasya—his; putraḥ—son; bṛhaddhanuḥ—Bṛhaddhanu; bṛhatkāyaḥ—Bṛhatkāya; tataḥ—thereafter; tasya—his; putraḥ—son; āsīt—was; jayadrathaḥ—Jayadratha.
translation: From Ajamīḍha came a son named Bṛhadiṣu, from Bṛhadiṣu came a son named Bṛhaddhanu, from Bṛhaddhanu a son named Bṛhatkāya, and from Bṛhatkāya a son named Jayadratha.
